This vignette introduces regDIF to the general user by providing common use
cases.

## LASSO regularization for evaluating DIF in 2PL-IRT model.

With a large tau parameter, there should be no DIF effects.
```{r,eval=T,message=F,echo=F}
library(regDIF)
head(ida)
item.data <- ida[,1:6]
pred.data <- ida[,7:9]
fit <- regDIF(item.data, pred.data, tau = 2)
summary(fit)
```
